message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split. We can adjust in the next round if you think it's not quite right.
You started high, I'll start low. Can we meet in the middle?
I'm willing to meet in the middle, but with inflation, I need a bit more than your last offer.  Let's split it 40/60 this time.
You're getting closer, but I think I can do better than that. Give me a bit more and we can finalize the deal.
